remarks: The orthocomplement of a subspace atom is a hyperplane.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2014.)
statement:
dochsatshp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochsatshp.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsatshp.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsatshp.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
dochsatshp.y $e |- Y = ( LSHyp ` U ) $.
dochsatshp.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochsatshp.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
dochsatshp $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` Q ) e. Y ) $.
